mapper.insert: insert into athlete(name, id_number, age, gender, athlete_id, team_id) values (#{name}, #{idNumber}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{athleteId}, #{teamId})
insert into coach (name, id_number, gender, phone, team_id) values (#{name}, #{idNumber}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{teamId})
insert into referee (name, id_number, phone, team_id, user_id) values (#{name}, #{idNumber}, #{phone}, #{teamId}, #{userId})
insert into team_doctor (name, id_number, phone, team_id) values (#{name}, #{idNumber}, #{phone}, #{teamId})
insert into team_leader (name, id_number, phone, team_id) values (#{name}, #{idNumber}, #{phone}, #{teamId})
mapper.update: update athlete set name = #{name}, id_number = #{idNumber}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, athlete_id = #{athleteId}, team_id = #{teamId} where id = #{id}
